channel.title: [317] How do you make a weapon 2h?
channel.description: How do you make an item unequip your off item, like a shield, as well as your main weapon?

item.title: [317] How do you make a weapon 2h?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

int[] two_hand = {841, 6609, 1319, 4718, 4726, 1409, 4710, 7158, 8100, 3204, 4755, 4153, 4827,667,35,2402,746, 6528,843,845,849,847,853,851,859,861, 4734,4214,4215,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223, 4747 }; << add your id too that

^^ Located in client.java

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How do you make a weapon 2h?
